marketplaces.name: my-claude-skills
marketplaces.description: Binary analysis skills for Claude Code: angr (static) and Frida (dynamic)
marketplaces.repo_description: Binary analysis plugins for Claude Code: angr (static analysis, symbolic execution) and Frida (dynamic instrumentation)

plugins.name: angr-analyzer
plugins.description: Static binary analysis with angr: decompilation, CFG recovery, symbolic execution, vulnerability detection

plugins.name: frida-instrument
plugins.description: Dynamic binary instrumentation with Frida: function tracing, API hooking, memory inspection, Stalker tracing
